name: Young Flame Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Fire Incarnate
special_abilities.desc: Creatures with resistance to fire damage don't have resistance to the fire damage dealt by the flame dragon. A creature with immunity to fire damage is still immune to the dragon's fire damage.

special_abilities.name: Heated Body
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the flame dragon or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.
